article_title: Medicaid expansion is expected to strain mental health services
article_text: As millions of Americans gain health coverage through the Affordable Care Act’s Medicaid expansion, experts say their higher rates of mental health and substance abuse disorders will be difficult to treat due to a lack of counselors and behavioral therapists who accept Medicaid patients.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Affordable Care Act, Medicaid, mental health, Obamacare
article_metadata.title: Medicaid expansion is expected to strain mental health services | McClatchy DC
